name: part_007
file: tmp_【 #ReGLOSS3Dライブ 】Sakura Mirage ⧸ 新曲サクラミラージュ披露！【 ミニライブ 】 [qc2owX4GFwA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: MC section where ReGLOSS members talk about a small mistake during their previous performance and prepare for their new song.
Performance of their new song 'Sakura Mirage'.

subtitles.original: ちょっと1回混ぜてみてみてみて
subtitles.english: Wait, let's try mixing it up once.

subtitles.original: え、ちょさ、早速なんだけどさ
subtitles.english: Eh, wait, it's a bit sudden...

subtitles.original: ちょ、さっきのさ、踊った時のさ、ミスの話していい？
subtitles.english: Can I talk about the mistake when we were dancing earlier?

subtitles.original: あ、いいよ
subtitles.english: Oh, sure.

subtitles.original: 足踏んだよね
subtitles.english: You stepped on my foot, right?

subtitles.original: え、内緒、内緒、内緒の話
subtitles.english: Eh, it's a secret, a secret talk!

subtitles.original: そうなの？そうなの？
subtitles.english: Is that so? Is that so?

subtitles.original: リリカがすっと足を引いちゃった
subtitles.english: Ririka just pulled her foot away.

subtitles.original: 後でみんなアーカイブで見てみてね
subtitles.english: Everyone, please check the archive later.

subtitles.original: でも全然軽かったから
subtitles.english: But it was totally light!

subtitles.original: え、気づいてなかったの？気づいてると思ってた
subtitles.english: Eh, you didn't notice? I thought you noticed.

subtitles.original: 気づいてるけど言わなかった。ごめんね
subtitles.english: I noticed, but I didn't say anything. Sorry!

subtitles.original: あーごめんね
subtitles.english: Ah, I'm sorry!

subtitles.original: いや、今言ったら面白いかなと思って
subtitles.english: No, I just thought it would be funny if I said it now.

subtitles.original: ちょっと一緒にお水飲んでこようかな
subtitles.english: Maybe I'll go drink some water together with you.

subtitles.original: はい。じゃあね。この後みんながお水から戻ってきたら踊りましょう
subtitles.english: Alright. Well then, let's dance after everyone returns from drinking water.

subtitles.original: そして歌いましょう
subtitles.english: And let's sing.

subtitles.original: え、リリカも飲まなくて大丈夫？
subtitles.english: Eh, Ririka, are you okay not drinking?

subtitles.original: あ、飲んどくわ。ちょっと
subtitles.english: Ah, I'll drink some. Just a bit.

subtitles.original: 私も飲んどく
subtitles.english: I'll drink some too.

subtitles.original: 一列になっとく？なっとこ、なっとこ
subtitles.english: Shall we line up? Let's, let's.

subtitles.original: 対称性始まる？
subtitles.english: Is the symmetry starting?

subtitles.original: やるか、もう一回ね
subtitles.english: Shall we do it? One more time.

subtitles.original: 一番前以外もやってみたいんだよね
subtitles.english: I want to try being somewhere other than the very front.

subtitles.original: 一番前どうしたいの？
subtitles.english: What do you want to do at the very front?

subtitles.original: なんかうにょうにょうにょって感じ
subtitles.english: Like, wiggle wiggle wiggle...

subtitles.original: そこまでじゃなかったかな
subtitles.english: It wasn't quite that much.

subtitles.original: それでは改めてまして、新曲『サクラミラージュ』聴いてください。どうぞ
subtitles.english: Then once again, please listen to our new song, 'Sakura Mirage'. Here you go.

subtitles.original: サクラミラージュ
subtitles.english: Sakura Mirage

subtitles.original: Step in to your eye / Make me feel alive
subtitles.english: Step into your eye / Make me feel alive

subtitles.original: それは始まりの合図
subtitles.english: That's the signal of the beginning

subtitles.original: Are you ready for this?
subtitles.english: Are you ready for this?

subtitles.original: 柔らかな風 ほら春めいて
subtitles.english: Soft breeze, look, it's feeling like spring

subtitles.original: 共鳴するファンファーレ
subtitles.english: The resonating fanfare

subtitles.original: 臆面もなく染める桃色
subtitles.english: Pink coloring without hesitation

subtitles.original: 別れの予感はソメイヨシノ
subtitles.english: Premonition of parting is Someiyoshino

subtitles.original: 浴びて 浴びて 浴びて 本領発揮
subtitles.english: Bathe in it, bathe in it, bathe in it, show your true colors

subtitles.original: 浴びて Dance with me now
subtitles.english: Bathe in it, dance with me now

subtitles.original: 躍り出した天かわる
subtitles.english: The dancing sky changes

subtitles.original: 君とのコントラスト
subtitles.english: Contrast with you

subtitles.original: 強い白馬はいつかのため
subtitles.english: Strong white horse is for someday

subtitles.original: Stay Best for Life
subtitles.english: Stay Best for Life

subtitles.original: 時折咲く震えた音
subtitles.english: Faltering sounds that occasionally bloom

subtitles.original: 噛み締めるまだ微熱のウィーアー
subtitles.english: Savoring the still slight fever "We are"

subtitles.original: 飛んでけ Bigger Dive どんなウィーバー
subtitles.english: Fly away Bigger Dive, whatever weaver

subtitles.original: 解き放て On My Mind
subtitles.english: Unleash it On My Mind

subtitles.original: 春が来た さあさ サクラミラージュ
subtitles.english: Spring has come, come on, Sakura Mirage

subtitles.original: 咲いて儚んで笑って Endless
subtitles.english: Bloom, be ephemeral, laugh, Endless

subtitles.original: 揺れながら まだ夢の中さ
subtitles.english: Swaying, still in a dream

subtitles.original: そっとささやいて 叶えて Step for me
subtitles.english: Softly whisper, grant it, Step for me

subtitles.original: Make me, Make me, Make me
subtitles.english: Make me, make me, make me

subtitles.original: 花開く
subtitles.english: Flowers bloom

subtitles.original: 行き着く暇もない Life is
subtitles.english: Life with no time to settle down is

subtitles.original: パパパパ パラダイス
subtitles.english: Pa-pa-pa-pa Paradise

subtitles.original: 一世一代の今を愛し合おう
subtitles.english: Let's love each other in this once-in-a-lifetime now

subtitles.original: 花開く
subtitles.english: Flowers bloom

subtitles.original: 大胆不敵なラプソディ
subtitles.english: Bold and fearless rhapsody

subtitles.original: キラリラビータ
subtitles.english: Kirari ra vita

subtitles.original: Stay for me
subtitles.english: Stay for me

subtitles.original: ぼやけてしまいそうな桃源郷
subtitles.english: Arcadia that seems like it might blur

subtitles.original: 完璧に描けなくたっていいや
subtitles.english: It's okay even if it can't be drawn perfectly

subtitles.original: 熱を帯びたまま 込み上げるフィルモア
subtitles.english: While heated, the surging 'Fill more'

subtitles.original: はらり 刷新だ 中枢へ
subtitles.english: Fluttering, it's a renovation to the core

subtitles.original: 新しい自分を この目でキャッチしよう
subtitles.english: Let's catch the new me with these eyes

subtitles.original: 変わらないものを胸に
subtitles.english: With unchanging things in our hearts

subtitles.original: 歩んでいこう
subtitles.english: Let's walk forward

subtitles.original: センチメンツ 紡ぐものがたりは Endless
subtitles.english: The story woven by sentiments is Endless

subtitles.original: Come on now
subtitles.english: Come on now

subtitles.original: 解き澄ませ 今日までを
subtitles.english: Unleash it, everything until today

subtitles.original: Carry out Sneaker 羅針盤突き放せ
subtitles.english: Carry out Sneaker, push away the compass

subtitles.original: 咲き誇れ Love for now
subtitles.english: Bloom proudly Love for now

subtitles.english: Better than tomorrow and beyond being a cliché scenario

subtitles.original: 右往左往しながら 起死回生
subtitles.english: Resuscitation while wandering back and forth

subtitles.original: トップシステムで 巻き起こす ニューウェーブ
subtitles.english: New wave stirred up by the top system

subtitles.original: 沸き上がれ 人生は無限大
subtitles.english: Surge up, life is infinite

subtitles.original: Wake up Go! いつだって絶好調
subtitles.english: Wake up Go! Always in top form

subtitles.original: 練り出す シナジー

subtitles.original: 未来 切り開いて 響き合う 鼓動
subtitles.english: Beating hearts resonating, carving out the future

subtitles.original: ずっと飾らない君でいて
subtitles.english: Always be the unadorned you

subtitles.original: 一対一の温度で 誰かがそよげば
subtitles.english: If someone sways with a one-on-one temperature

subtitles.original: 霞んでもいい 芽吹いてメロディ
subtitles.english: It's okay to be hazy, sprout Melody

subtitles.original: この鼓動に泳いで恋して
subtitles.english: Swim in this heartbeat and fall in love
